column3: and [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Ronald]] take a train to the coast near Cape Town so Ronald can be in the cooler air.

column1: * After they return home a trip to England is decided as [[Mabel Suffield|Mabel]] dislikes the hot climate and the [[Bloemfontein]] lifestyle
column2: even though [[Arthur Tolkien|Arthur]] is happy with it.

column1: * "My first Christmas memory is of blazing sun
column2: drawn curtains and a drooping eucalyptus" ([[Letter 163]])
